rules_text:
Flying
When Spinner of Fictions enters the battlefield, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of colors in your coalition. Separate those cards into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put that pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. [i](Your coalition contains up to one different permanent of each color.)[/i]
